articles.description: Arsenal thrash Manchester City to make a statement of intent in the Premier League title race as they cut Liverpool's lead at the top back to six points.
articles.title: Arsenal 5-1 Manchester City: Teenagers Nwaneri & Lewis-Skelly score as Gunners run riot

articles.description: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are "trying everything" to strengthen his squad before the transfer window closes following another home defeat – but will not repeat "the mistake of the past".
articles.title: Manchester United 'trying everything' to sign players, says Ruben Amorim

articles.description: Meet India's latest batting superstar Abhishek Sharma, who struck a record-breaking 135 in their T20 win over England.
articles.title: India cricket: Abhishek Sharma shines in T20 win over England

articles.description: After 20 years at Manchester United, Marcus Rashford is set to leave for Aston Villa, leaving many questions and few answers.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford transfer: Manchester United to Aston Villa

articles.description: "This feels like a new low for the defending Premier League champions," said BBC Radio 5 Live's John Murray as the final whistle went on another miserable day for Manchester City.
articles.title: Arsenal 5-1 Man City: A new low for defending champions after Premier League rout?

articles.description: In a week that could define their season, Tottenham answer their critics with a superb and resolute victory at Brentford.
articles.title: Spurs are still 'hurting', but they have found defensive strength and spirit

articles.description: Text commentary of Sunday's final round of the Pebble Beach Pro-Am with Rory McIlroy and Shane Lowry just one shot behind leader Sepp Straka in California.
articles.title: Pebble Beach Pro-Am: McIlroy and Lowry in contention as Straka leads - text updates

articles.description: Five-time NBA All-Star Luka Doncic joins the Los Angeles Lakers in a huge three-way trade deal.
articles.title: Luka Doncic joins Los Angeles Lakers from Dallas Mavericks in huge NBA trade deal

articles.description: Title challengers, European contenders and relegation-threatened sides have one last chance to sign players before the window closes - here are some of the potential talking points.
articles.title: Transfer deadline day 2025: What to expect from deadline day

articles.description: Barcelona move four points behind La Liga leaders Real Madrid as Robert Lewandowski's goal is enough to edge past Alaves.
articles.title: Barcelona 1-0 Alaves: Hosts move four points behind leaders Real Madrid
